poem:
### The Pause Between Seasons

The screen fades,
a cliffhanger's shadow lingers,
time's cruel grip tightens,
the seasons turn without change.
We wait, chained to anticipation,
souls adrift in televised suspense,
seeking closure in a world
that thrives on our longing.
